plot: Following a smoothly executed job, small time crook discovers the heist has only just begun. Eight Goons. One score. No Honor Among Thieves.
plot_en: Following a smoothly executed job, small time crook discovers the heist has only just begun. Eight Goons. One score. No Honor Among Thieves.
plot_es: Following a smoothly executed job, small time crook discovers the heist has only just begun. Eight Goons. One score. No Honor Among Thieves.
title: Goon
